name: Roy Tang
text: Regional Operating Headquarters. It was a special benefit given before to companies who registered as an ROHQ, their employees (may certain requirements on income) could be given a preferential tax rate of 15%. The TRAIN bill retained this mechanism, but the veto removed it.
